dialogs.responseText: Aaarrrgh!!!! I deserved to win that fight! The other guy didn't fight fair! No matter how many times I swing my knife it feels like he's cheating! I hardly do any damage! To top it off, I don't even get any consolation tokens for trying! This dojo system is stupid.
You do? Hey I'll trade you! I have all these belts and I can't even wear them.
